metadata.title: CVE-2024-27007 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:userfaultfd: change src_folio after ensuring it's unpinned in UFFDIO_MOVECommit d7a08838ab74 ("mm: userfaultfd: fix unexpected change to src_foliowhen UFFDIO_MOVE fails") moved the src_folio->{mapping, index} changing toafter clearing the page-table and ensuring that it's not pinned. Thisavoids failure of swapout+migration and possibly memory corruption.However, the commit missed fixing it in the huge-page case.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-27007` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.15.0-1119-fips - 4.15.0-1119.130
linux-image-hmac-4.15.0-1119-fips - 4.15.0-1119.130
linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-1119-fips - 4.15.0-1119.130
linux-image-unsigned-hmac-4.15.0-1119-fips - 4.15.0-1119.130
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-2103-aws-fips - 4.15.0-2103.109
linux-image-unsigned-hmac-4.15.0-2103-aws-fips - 4.15.0-2103.109
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-2082-azure-fips - 4.15.0-2082.88
